summary: A man awakens on his Shanghai houseboat--alone. His girlfriend has suddenly disappeared, leaving behind the one thing that could lead to her whereabouts: her smartphone.
cast: Leehom Wang|Xia Tai Li|Sol Ye|Sun Lu Fei|Joan Chen|Dang Hui|Zhu Yan|Yue Chao|Gang Cai|Olivia Munn|Fan Yu Lin|Ma Jiang De|Li Yan|Michael Dorman|Tang Ying|Pei Xiao Jun|Iakovlev Oleksandr|Han Hao Zhe|Zhen Qi Dong|Drew Fralick
title: Lifeline
